resources:
MEANWHILE TODO ASSESSMENTS TAKE PRETEST TAKE POST TEST PLAY GAME The purpose of the project is to create a web-and-moobile based game application that will prevent future complications of malnutrition and to provide an innovative teaching concept that gives an opportunity for children to learn the basic nutrition food groups and healthy food practices, and these will also help inculcate in children good decision in choosing for healthy food options as early as possible. Good health and proper nutrition are essential for a child to fully achieve his full potential for growth and development.
OBJECTIVES The proposed system is intended to develop a Healthy Foodie Nutrition App that creates and validates a modern interactive nutrition teaching module for the children, providing a fun activity to learn more about nutrition. This application is designed to answer by children ranges from six to ten years old, and it consists of different phases that are presented in English language that includes a Filipino translation.
PURPOSE PRODUCT PERSPECTIVE The Healthy Foodie App is an educational, self-contained and a web-based game application for children to learn and understand the importance of nutrition and how it impacts not only their physical body but their health and lifestyle. Basically, it is a game for children and a simple user interface for children to understand and comprehend. It is an application designed for children to learn at the same time to have fun.
PEOPLE BEHIND HEALTHY FOODIE
//people behind Endocrinologist at the Nutrition center, UST pay Hospital Email Address: florence_rochelle_gan@yahoo.com CATHERINE BHEL CARCHA I am Cathy, 19 y/o Front-end Developer of Healthy Foodie Web application. I am in charge in creating a user-friendly interface and design that can really attract the attention of the user. I live in Mandaluyong City, Philippines. I really love being creative in many ways. And I am happy that I found a way to share my creativity to others through the course I am pursuing right now. Some might say that I am different. That I am weak in this field and I will not survive. At first, I couldn’t agree more on what they are saying but at the end I know that I am on the right track. For me, it is by our own way on how we will choose to survive every challenge we have. It is because of us why we can make things work out unexpectedly and end up enjoying what we do. Email Address: cthy.bhel@gmail.com DOMINIC MICHAEL CASIÑO I am Dom. Currently 19 years old and currently residing in Pasig City. I develop mostly front end but can also work on a little bit of back end. When working on a project, I like to understand the most that I can fron both the front end ang back end of the project, so I can get a better perspective and perform my job more effectively. My skills are gained from my school courses and on the job training but I am always willing to learn something new. I also believe that constant communication with the team and the client is important in developing. Email Address: domcasi25@gmail.com SCOTT PONS I’m Scott 19 y/o Front-end and Back-End developer and programmer with focus in user experience and minimalistic design, currently living in Marikina City, Philipines. I love what I do since I’ve started doing it. I find every new experience as an opportunity to learn. My favorite projects are those that require me to push beyond my boundaries and acquire new skills and knowledge in order to succeed. In my spare time I enjoy experimenting with new frameworks and libraries. Email Address: scottpons09@gmail.com DEVELOPERS INSERT INFO HERE IICS-CNAG COMDEV CLIENT Dr. FLORENCE ROCHELLE GAN
